column3: @laanwj Not sure I understand. Is //<! used anywhere else in the code so far? I've not spotted any examples so far.\n

Not sure whether it's already used, but it should be used.

See http://www.stack.nl/~dimitri/doxygen/manual/docblocks.html

It's also mentioned in doc/coding-style.md
Something similar is included in #2784, which changes the meanings of some of those variables.\n
Apologies, these are about message sends, not pings.\n
